short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ATLYSS is a (Single-player  + Multi-player) Action Online Role Playing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enriched, instanced maps to discover
Equipment, Trade Items and Consumables to collect
Many Character Customization options with 5 races to choose from
3 Primary Classes to become at lv-10 (Fighter, Bandit, Mystic)
Skill load-out system for making builds to suit your game-play style
Character stat progression / leveling systems / attributes
